title: A Good beginning
creator_credit: Modern Management Films and Norwood Studios
brief_description: Demonstrates the right way to induct and train employees on new jobs. Seen through the eyes of a young girl hired to learn a data processing card-punch operation. Compares correct techniques with wrong techniques. Reminds supervisors of the need to relieve tensions in the new employee before useful training can begin.
